lead_paragraph: FOLEY--Joan (Coleman). 87, passed away on March 30th in Florida after a brief illness. Mrs. Foley was born in Rockville, CT on February 10, 1929, a daughter to the late Francis and Kathryn Coleman. She was predeceased by her husband of 63 years, Joseph Foley and her sister Judith Bailey. Mrs. Foley graduated Clinton High School in 1946 and Barry College in 1950. Mrs. Foley is survived by her brother Francis Coleman and wife Susan of Clinton, MA, brother-in-law Charles Foley and wife Marie of Florida; several nieces, nephews, and many dear friends who will forever miss her kindness, humor and generous spirit. Mrs. Foley and her husband Joe owned and operated The Foley Literary Agency in New York City for over 50 years. The two enjoyed life in New York City and especially cherished time with friends and family. A Funeral Mass will be celebrated in St. Patrick's Lady Cathedral, Saturday, May 14, 2016 at 10am. A reception will follow at Langan's Restaurant, 150 West 47th St., New York, NY 10036. 1/3
